column5: Sleded and myself headed over to a semi-local spot today in search of treats and perch. I stuck to my vorms while Sleded used minerals and we made quite a team. I'd say it was a very successful day, the wind was nippy but we stuck it out and got a pail full of sweet, wonderful fillet meat. When those tasty fillets hit your tongue, it makes every minnow used feel like petty cash - Trademark, Rich Enterprises 2007  And now for picsssssssssseeeeeeeeeeooooooooooooweeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee!   Sleded's lazy treat setup   My expensive rod holder   A nice attention perch   Sleded's attention stick   A treat laying next to the high tech equipment used to land her   Some troll holding a treat   Sleded got the biggest attention fish of the day however with this nice little pike.  All in all a great day to kick off the year!

Nice going there, how deep were the fish and how many did you end up catching for the day?  Amazing to still catch fish at this time of  year from shore, that's impressive!!!!  Pice seema bit blurry,, using a new camera?

Nice job guys glad to see ya got out, even though we all wait patiently for the ice to BEGIN forming at least somebody is still fishin...lol. Gotta like Slededs expensive rod holder. Better than the old black beater eh? Blueys and perchies yummy....wish I could get out too.
Had a blast with ya rich well do her up again this weekend. Joonmoon nothing beats the redneck beater ha ha ha ha ha had had to retire her i still miss her.
Nice pike.  Thanks for the report.
Nice chunky pike. And ahhh those Gills. I'm trying to find them too.
Good way to start off the New Year for sure....beats working I can tell ya that  Maureen
great job guys!  Whata way to start the new year!  CHeers!
Nice one,  That pike is so light coloured.
